cause.description:
The orangutans* and their natural enviroment, the rainforests are in danger of total annihilation. You can help. More correctly, you will help, because if you don't the Librarian** will snap your neck. Because not all orangutans have the comfort of a nice, magical library and wizards to bring them bananas.
*Which are very definitly apes. Don't even think about using the m-word. **Totally and shamelessly borrowed from Terry Pratchett and Discworld.
1. Silence.
2. Books must be returned no later than the date shown.
3. Do not meddle with the nature of causality.
cause.mission: save the orangutans so that the Librarian doesn't have to make things very, very painful for you.
cause.name: Ook ook
